admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (a)
            construction, furnishing and equipping of 8 vocational
            training institutes, with 450 places each with boarding
            facilities; (b) equipment for the Central Vocational
            Training Institute in the fields of precision measurement,
            electrical fitting, machining, sheet metal work, and welding
            to give direct support to the VTIs, and permit an expansion
            of the enrollment in the regular 2-year course from 660 to
            750, and an increase in the annual output of instructors
            from about 320 to 370; and (c) expert services for the VTB,
            and specialist services to the CVTI and the VTIs.
